message: On the other side of the door is a long, white corridor.
So this is Oval Tower...
I've heard that the tower has some areas open to the public, but we came in from the staff entrance, so there aren't any visitors in sight.
I hear the faint sound of footsteps in the distance. Probably guards on patrol.
We make our way cautiously down the hall.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Something doesn't feel right."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. With all the racket we made out there, why aren't there alarms going off?"
Neither of us needs to say it. We're thinking the same thing.

What with that door opening on it's own and all...
It has to be a trap, right?
Still, no turning back now. We keep moving until we see an elevator at the end of the hallway.
Two guards are standing next to the elevator. We try to slip into a side corridor to hide before they see us.
However...

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Hey! Where did you come from?!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Shit."
Too slow. Footsteps are approaching rapidly.
Koujaku and I exchange nods.
He runs out into the hall first. I follow.

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Who the― Whoa!"
Koujaku knocks the first guard off his feet.
Meanwhile, I kick the other guard down and run for the elevator.
I reach out and smack the call button.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Sto―"

name: 紅雀
message: "You look like you could use a nap!"
As the second guard starts to rise, Koujaku knocks him out with a blow to the back of the head.
Then he pulls the sword from his back, sheath and all, and delivers a punishing blow to the first guard's gut.

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Ugh!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku!"
The elevator's here.
With a shout to Koujaku, I jump inside and hit the button to close the doors.
Koujaku slips through just before they shut.
